channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: California wildfire flareup prompts evacuation in San Bernardino County
item.description: California residents near a wildfire that is largely contained have been ordered to evacuate after the blaze in San Bernardino County flared up.

item.title: Key Senate race in Arizona could hinge on voters who back Trump and the Democratic candidate
item.description: If Ruben Gallego is going to give Democrats their fourth straight U.S. Senate victory in Arizona, heâ€™s probably going to need support from an unlikely group: Donald Trump voters.

item.title: Montana man faces sentencing for cloning giant sheep to breed large sheep for captive trophy hunts
item.description: An 81-year-old Montana man is expected to be sentenced for using tissue and testicles from large sheep hunted in Central Asia and the U.S. to illegally create hybrid sheep for captive trophy hunts in Texas and Minnesota.
